help.description: Shows the help page which has all the information about the commands or about a specific command.

usage.description: Provides information about all of the bot's commands.
Provides help and information about the specified command.

cmdNotFound.title: Error has occured while running this command.
cmdNotFound.description: No information found for the following command:

embed.title: Yono Help Command
embed.description:
{EMOJI_INFO} **Yono** bot is a multi purpose bot made for everyone, Yono (You only need one). Need help? the following links might help you:

{EMOJI_CHROME} Web Help: [Website](https://yonobot.co.uk) | [FAQ Website](https://yonobot.co.uk/faq)

{EMOJI_SUPPORT}  If these aren't helpful enough feel free to drop by our discord community & support server. [Discord Server](https://discord.gg/9BysjJweDt)

 > Admin/Moderation: `ban`, `unban`, `kick`, `purge`, `lock`, `unlock`, `mute`, `unmute`, `addrole`, `removerole`, `autorole`, `urlprot`

 > Information/Utility: `help`, `ping`, `say`, `avatar`, `addemoji`, `weather`, `remind`, `support`, `autoping`

> Fun/Images: `binary`, `iq`, `cylde`, `meme`, `joke`, `advice`, `8ball`, `coinflip`, `dice`, `facepalm`, `eject`, `tweet`

> Giveaways/Invite Management: `create`, `reroll`, `end`, `list`

usage.description: Get the bot's latency/API latency

serverinfo.description: Gets the server information such as, Owner, User Count, etc..

usage.description: Provides all the server information.

support.description: Gives information on how you can contact us

usage.description: Provides support links, and contact

embed.title: Yono Support Methods
embed.description: Need help? check out our discord server or website for help:

eightball.description: This command has 8 possible answers such as yes, no, etc..

usage.description: Rolls the 8ball and provides a random response.

embed.title: My Reply Is:
embed.description: > ||This command's only a joke, please do not take it seriously||

usage.description: Provides advice from an advanced AI

binary.description: Converts any text written to binary.

usage.description: Changes the 'hello world' to binary. (Binary e.g. 0101010)

msgTooLong.title: An error has occured while running this command.

clyde.description: Writes whatever you write but cylde sends it

usage.description: Types the message in clyde and sends the image, in this case it's 'Discord bot's are pretty cool, especially Yono.'
usage.example: {PREFIX}clyde Discord bot's are pretty cool, especially Yono.

unknownError.title: Error has occured while running this command.

usage.description: Rolls the dice and gives a random number between 1-6

facepalm.description: Puts the image in a facepalm

usage.description: Generate an image with a facepalm of the mentioned user's avatar
Generates an image with a facepalm of the user that ran the command.

flipcoin.dDescription: Flips a coin to either land on: Heads or Tails

usage.description: Flips the coin to get heads or tails.

iq.dDescription: Gets the iq of the mentioned/given user

usage.description: Provides iq of the mentioned user
Provides iq of the user that ran the command.

usage.description: Puts the text that you put into an image tweet.

tweet.noTextProvided: Please enter a text to be put in the tweet

avatar.description: Gets your/or the mentioned user's avatar

usage.description: Provides the avatar of the mentioned user.

errorEmbed.title: Error has occured while running this command.
errorEmbed.description:

> Emoji Size exceeds 256kB
> The server has reached the max emoji's limit.

membercount.description: Gets the member count of the current discord server.

usage.description: Provides the membercount for the current guild

reminder.description: Reminds you of a specific thing in the time you specified.

usage.description: Set a reminder for seconds
Sets a reminder for minutes
Set a reminder for a hour
usage.example: {PREFIX}reminder 4h start a server requirement giveaway with yono, and setup invite management

invalidFormat.title: Error has occured while running this command.
invalidFormat.description:
Invalid Time Format, please make sure that your time ends with `s` for seconds or `m` for minutes or `h` for hours. e.g.
> `.remind 2h fix bugs

noText.title: Error has occured while running this command.
noText.description:
Please enter a text that you'll be reminded with. e.g.
> `.remind 30m create voice event`

embed.title: Reminder Created.
embed.description:
The reminder has been succesfully created below are the reminder's details:
> Reminder Text:

autoping.description: Pings the member when they join the server then deletes it.

usage.description: Sets the channel and the time required to delete (s/m)

autoping.argumentsNotProvided:
You need to set the channel and time to delete.

Usage: `{PREFIX}autoping [ Channel ] [ Time for message to be deleted. ]`
autoping.invalidChannel: The channel you've given was not found. Please make sure you mention the channel or give the channel ID.
autoping.minTime: Minimum time for the message to be deleted is 1 second, and max is 1 minute.
autoping.set: The autoping has been sucessfully set to:
